how should i store my mango

Store unripe mangoes at room temperature in a paper bag to speed up ripening—adding an apple or banana can help. Once ripe, refrigerate them in the crisper drawer or a plastic bag to extend freshness for 5–7 days. For cut mango, keep it in an airtight container in the fridge for up to 3 days, or freeze cubed pieces for longer storage.
